mTopic 1.0

    • P22 Mouse Brain (ATAC + RNA)

  • Interactive Dashboard

Reference

All functions

MTM()

Multimodal Topic Model (MTM) for single-cell data analysis.

SVI()

Perform Stochastic Variational Inference (SVI) for large-scale data.

VI()

Perform Variational Inference (VI) to infer topics from the data.

clr()

Perform Centered Log-Ratio (CLR) normalization on a modality in a Seurat object.

export_params()

Export model parameters (gamma and lambda) to a Seurat object and filter insignificant topics.

feature_associations()

Cross-modality feature associations.

feature_associations_data()

Prepare topic signatures for training feature associations.

filter_var_knee()

Filter overrepresented features from a Seurat object using a knee detection algorithm.

filter_var_list()

Retain a specific list of features in a Seurat object.

permute()

Randomly permute the count matrices.

plot_corr_heatmap()

Visualize the correlation matrix between two sets of features as a heatmap.

plot_dominant_topics()

Visualize the dominant topic for each sample in a Seurat object.

plot_feature_activity()

Visualize the distribution of specified features in a MuData object.

plot_filter_topics()

Visualize the significance of topics based on their maximum probability across cells.

plot_filter_var_knee()

Detect and visualize overrepresented features using a knee detection algorithm.

plot_scatter_pie()

Create a scatter plot with pie charts representing topic distributions at each sample coordinate.

plot_signatures()

Visualize the top features (signatures) for each topic in a specified modality of a Seurat object.

plot_topics()

Visualize topic distributions on spatial coordinates or embedding.

plot_zscores()

Visualize the spatial or embedding-based distribution of z-scores for topics in a specified modality.

sMTM()

Spatial Multimodal Topic Model (sMTM) for single-cell spatial data analysis.

scale_counts()

Scale count matrices to normalize the total sum of counts across modalities.

tfidf()

Apply Term Frequency-Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF) transformation to a specific modality in a Seurat object.

umap()

Perform UMAP dimensionality reduction on topic distributions and store the results in the MuData object.

update_assays()

Update Assay to Assay5.

zscores()

Compute z-scores for the top features in each topic within a MuData object.
